name: CI/CD Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  lint:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v2
    - name: Set up Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v2
      with:
        python-version: '3.8'
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: |
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        pip install pylint
    - name: Lint code
      run: |
        pylint src/*.py

  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v2
    - name: Set up Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v2
      with:
        python-version: '3.8'
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: |
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        pip install -r requirements.txt
    - name: Run tests
      run: |
        python -m unittest discover -s tests

  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: test
    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v2
    - name: Set up Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v2
      with:
        python-version: '3.8'
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: |
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        pip install -r requirements.txt boto3
    - name: Train model and save artifact
      env:
        MODEL_VERSION: ${{ github.sha }} # Use commit SHA as version
      run: |
        python src/train.py
        tar -czvf model_${{ github.sha }}.tar.gz model_${{ github.sha }}.pkl
    - name: Upload model to AWS S3
      env:
        AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID: ${{ secrets.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID }}
        AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY: ${{ secrets.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY }}
      run: |
        aws s3 cp model_${{ github.sha }}.tar.gz s3://your-bucket-name/models/model_${{ github.sha }}.tar.gz
